entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 14. UV index 8 or very high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing late in the evening and dissipating overnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 18 April 2023
